title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: When he had gone I breathed joyfully and freely. The rigid face and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: staring eye that I had cultivated relaxed into a natural smile and then
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I broke into a laugh. Here I was in the heart of Berlin, unsuspected of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: being other than a loyal German and free, for the time at least, from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: problems of personal relations.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I now made an elaborate inspection of my surroundings. I found a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: wardrobe full of men's clothing, all of a single shade of mauve like the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: suit I wore. Some suits I guessed to be work clothes from their cheaper
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: texture and some, much finer, were evidently dress apparel.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Having reassured myself that Armstadt had been the only occupant of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: apartment, I turned to a pile of papers that the hospital attendant had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: picked up from the floor where they had dropped from a mail chute. Most
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of these proved to be the accumulated copies of a daily chemical news
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: bulletin. Others were technical chemical journals. Among the letters I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found an invitation to a meeting of a chemical society, and a note from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my tailor asking me to call; the third letter was written on a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: typewriter, an instrument the like of which I had already discovered in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my study. This sheet bore a neatly engraved head reading "Katrina,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Permit 843 LX, Apartment 57, K Street, Level of the Free Women." The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: letter ran:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Dear Karl: For three weeks now you have failed to keep
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: your appointments and sent no explanation. You surely know
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that I will not tolerate such rude neglect. I have reported
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to the Supervisor that you are dropped from my list."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: So this was Katrina! Here at last was the end of the fears that had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: haunted me.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I was scanning the chemical journal I heard a bell ring and turning
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: about I saw that a metal box had slid forth upon a side board from an
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: opening in the wall. In this box I found my dinner which I proceeded to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: enjoy in solitude. The food was more varied than in the hospital. Some
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was liquid and some gelatinous, and some firm like bread or biscuit. But
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of natural food products there was nothing save a dish of mushrooms and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a single sprig of green no longer than my finger, and which, like a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: feather in a boy's cap, was inserted conspicuously in the top of a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: synthetic pudding. There was one food that puzzled me, for it was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sausage-like in form and sausage-like in flavour, and I was sure
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: contained some real substance of animal origin. Presuming, as I did at
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that moment, that no animal life existed in Berlin, I ate this sausage
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: with doubts and misgivings.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The dinner finished, I looked for a way to dispose of the dishes.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Packing them back in the container I fumbled about and found a switch
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which set something going in the wall, and my dishes departed to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: public dishwasher.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Having cleared the desk I next turned to Armstadt's book shelves. My
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: attention was caught by a ponderous volume. It proved to be an atlas and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: directory of Berlin. In the front of this was a most revealing diagram
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which showed Berlin to be a city of sixty levels. The five lowest levels
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were underground and all were labelled "Mineral Industries." Above these
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were eight levels of Food, Clothing and Miscellaneous industries. Then
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: came the seven workmen's residence levels, divided by trade groups.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Above this were the four "Intellectual Levels," on one of which I, as a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemist had my abode. Directly above these was the "Level of Free
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Women," and above that the residence level for military officers. The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: next was the "Royal Level," double in height of the other levels of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: city. Then came the "Administrative Level," followed by eight maternity
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: levels, then four levels of female schools and nine levels of male
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: schools. Then, for six levels, and reaching to within five levels of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: roof of the city, were soldiers' barracks. Three of the remaining floors
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were labelled "Swine Levels" and one "Green Gardens." Just beneath the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: roof was the defence level and above that the open roof itself.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: It was a city of some three hundred metres in height with mineral
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: industries at the bottom and the swine levels--I recalled the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sausage--at the top. Midway between, remote from possible attack through
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: mines or from the roof, Royalty was sheltered, while the other
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: privileged groups of society were stratified above and below it.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Following the diagram of levels was a most informing chart arranged like
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a huge multiplication table. It gave after each level the words
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "permitted," "forbidden," and "permitted as announced," arranged in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: columns for each of the other levels. From this I traced out that as a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemist I was permitted on all the industrial, workmen's and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: intellectual levels, and on the Level of Free Women. I was permitted, as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: announced, on the Administrative and Royal Levels; but forbidden on the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: levels of military officers and soldiers' barracks, maternity and male
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and female schools.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I found that as a chemist I was particularly fortunate for many other
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: groups were given even less liberty. As for common workmen and soldiers,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: they were permitted on no levels except their own.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The most perplexing thing about this system was the apparent segregation
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of such large groups of men from women. Family life in Germany was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: evidently wonderfully altered and seemingly greatly restricted, a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: condition inconsistent with the belief that I had always held--that the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German race was rapidly increasing.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Turning to my atlas index I looked up the population statistics of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: city, and found that by the last census it was near three hundred
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: million. And except for the few millions in the mines this huge mass of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: humanity was quartered beneath a single roof. I was greatly surprised,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for this population figure was more than double the usual estimates
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: current in the outside world. Coming from a world in which the ancient
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: tendency to congest in cities had long since been overcome, I was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: staggered by the fact that nearly as many people were living in this one
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: city as existed in the whole of North America.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Yet, when I figured the floor area of the city, which was roughly oval
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: in shape, being eight kilometres in breadth and eleven in length, I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found that the population on a given floor area was no greater than it
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had been in the Island of Manhattan before the reform land laws were put
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: into effect in the latter part of the Twentieth Century. There was,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: therefore, nothing incredible in these figures of total population, but
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: what I next discovered was a severe strain on credence. It was the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German population by sexes; the figures showed that there were nearly
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: two and a half males for every female! According to the usual estimate
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of war losses the figure should have been at a ratio of six women living
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to about five men, and here I found them recorded as only two women to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: five men. Inspection of the birth rate showed an even higher proportion
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of males. I consulted further tables that gave births by sexes and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: groups. These varied somewhat but there was this great preponderance of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: males in every class but one. Only among the seventeen thousand members
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of Royalty did the proportion of the sexes approach the normal.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Apparently I had found an explanation of the careful segregation of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German women--there were not enough to go around!
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Turning the further pages of my atlas I came upon an elaborately
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: illustrated directory of the uniforms and insignia of the various
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: military and civil ranks and classes. As I had already anticipated, I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found that any citizen in Berlin could immediately be placed in his
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: proper group and rank by his clothing, which was prescribed with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: military exactness.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Various fabrics and shades indicated the occupational grouping while
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: trimmings and insignia distinguished the ranks within the groups. In all
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: there were many hundreds of distinct uniforms. Two groups alone proved
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: exceptions to this iron clad rule; Royalty and free women were permitted
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to dress as they chose and were restricted only in that they were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: forbidden to imitate the particular uniforms of other groups.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I next investigated the contents of Armstadt's desk. My most interesting
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: find was a checkbook, with receipts and expenditures carefully recorded
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: on the stubs. From this I learned that, as Armstadt, I was in receipt of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: an income of five thousand marks, paid by the Government. I did not know
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: how much purchasing value that would amount to, but from the account
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: book I saw that the expenses had not equalled a third of it, which
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: explained why there was a bank balance of some twenty thousand marks.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Clearly I would need to master the signature of Karl Armstadt so I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: searched among the papers until I found a bundle of returned decks. Many
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the larger checks had been made out to "Katrina," others to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Master of Games,"--evidently to cover gambling losses. The smaller
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: checks, I found by reference to the stubs, were for ornaments or
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: entertainment that might please a woman. The lack of the more ordinary
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: items of expenditure was presently made clear by the discovery of a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: number of punch marked cards. For intermittent though necessary
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: expenses, such as tonsorial service, clothing and books. For the more
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: constant necessities of life, such as rent, food, laundry and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: transportation, there was no record whatever; and I correctly assumed
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that these were supplied without compensation and were therefore not a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: matter of personal choice or permissible variation. Of money in its
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ancient form of metal coins and paper, I found no evidence.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: In my mail the next morning I found a card signed by Lieut. Forrester of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the hospital staff. It read:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The bearer, Karl Armstadt, has recently suffered from gas poisoning
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: while defending the mines beneath enemy territory. This has affected his
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: memory. If he is therefore found disobeying any ruling or straying
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: beyond his permitted bounds, return him to his apartment and call the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Hospital for Complex Gas Cases."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: It was evidently a very kindly effort to protect a man whose loss of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: memory might lead him into infractions of the numerous rulings of German
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: life. With this help I became ambitious to try the streets of Berlin
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: alone. The notice from the tailor afforded an excuse.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Consulting my atlas to get my bearings I now ventured forth. The streets
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were tunnel-like passage-ways closed over with a beamed ceiling of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: whitish grey concrete studded with glowing light globes. In the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: residence districts the smooth side walls were broken only by high
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ventilating gratings and the narrow passage halls from which led the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: doors of the apartments.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The uncanny quiet of the streets of this city with its three hundred
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: million inhabitants awed and oppressed me. Hurriedly I walked along
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: occasionally passing men dressed like myself. They were pale men, with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: blanched or sallow faces. But nowhere were there faces of ruddy tan as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: one sees in a world of sun. The men in the hospital had been pale, but
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that had seemed less striking for one is used to pale faces in a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hospital. It came to me with a sense of something lost that my own
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: countenance blanched in the mine and hospital would so remain colourless
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: like the faces of the men who now stole by me in their felted footwear
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: with a cat-like tread.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: At a cross street I turned and came upon a small group of shops with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: monotonous panelled display windows inserted in the concrete walls. Here
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I found my tailor and going in I promptly laid down his notice and my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: clothing card. He glanced casually at the papers, punched the card and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: then looking up he remarked that my new suit had been waiting some time.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I began explaining the incident in the mine and the stay in the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hospital; but the tailor was either disinterested or did not comprehend.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Will you try on your new suit now?" he interrupted, holding forth the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: garments. The suit proved a trifle tight about the hips, but I hastened
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to assure the tailor that the fit was perfect. I removed it and watched
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: him do it up in a parcel, open a wall closet, call my house number, and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: send my suit on its way through one of the numerous carriers that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: interlaced the city.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I walked more leisurely back to my apartment by a less direct way, I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found my analytical brain puzzling over the refreshing quality of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: breezes that blew through those tunnel-like streets. With bits of paper
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I traced the air flow from the latticed faces of the elevator shafts to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the ventilating gratings of the enclosed apartments, and concluded that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: there must be other shafts to the rear of the apartments for its exit.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: It occurred to me that it must take an enormous system of ventilating
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: fans to keep this air in motion, and then I remembered the liquid air
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: engine I had seen in the mine, and a realization of the economy and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: efficiency of the whole scheme dawned upon me. The Germans had solved
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the power problem by using the heat of the deeper strata of the earth to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: generate power through the agency of liquid air and the exhaust from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: their engines had automatically solved their ventilating problem. I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: recalled with a smile that I had seen no evidence of heating apparatus
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: anywhere except that which the miners had used to warm their food. In
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: this city cooling rather than heating facilities would evidently be
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: needed, even in the dead of winter, since the heat generated by the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: inhabitants and the industrial processes would exceed the radiation from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the exterior walls and roof of the city. Sunshine and "fresh air" they
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had not, but our own scientists had taught us for generations that heat
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and humidity and not lack of oxygen or sunshine was the cause of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: depression experienced in indoor quarters. The air of Berlin was cool
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and the excess of vapor had been frozen out of it. Yes, the "climate" of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Berlin should be more salubrious to the body, if not to the mind, than
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the fickle environment of capricious nature. From my reasoning about
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: these ponderous problems of existence I was diverted to a trivial
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: matter. The men I observed on the streets all wore their hair clipped
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: short, while mine, with six weeks' growth, was getting rather long. I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had seen several barber's signs but I decided to walk on for quite a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: distance beyond my apartment. I did not want to confront a barber who
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had known Karl Armstadt, for barbers deal critically in the matter of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: heads and faces. At last I picked out a shop. I entered and asked for
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a haircut.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But you are not on my list," said the barber, staring at me in a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: puzzled way, "why do you not go to your own barber?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Grasping the situation I replied that I did not like my barber.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Then why do you not apply at the Tonsorial Administrative Office of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: level for permission to change?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Returning to my apartment I looked up the office in my directory, went
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: thither and asked the clerk if I could exchange barbers. He asked for my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: card and after a deal of clerical activities wrote thereon the name of a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: new barber. With this official sanction I finally got my hair cut and my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: card punched, thinking meanwhile that the soundness of my teeth would
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: obviate any amateur detective work on the part of a dentist.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Nothing, it seemed, was left for the individual to decide for himself.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: His every want was supplied by orderly arrangement and for everything he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: must have an authoritative permit. Had I not been classed as a research
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemist, and therefore a man of some importance, this simple business of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: getting a hair-cut might have proved my undoing. Indeed, as I afterwards
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: learned, the exclusive privacy of my living quarters was a mark of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: distinction. Had I been one of lower ranking I should have shared my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: apartment with another man who would have slept in my bed while I was at
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: work, for in the sunless city was neither night nor day and the whole
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: population worked and slept in prescribed shifts--the vast machinery of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: industry, like a blind giant in some Plutonic treadmill, toiled
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ceaselessly.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The next morning I decided to extend my travels to the medical level,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which was located just above my own. There were stairs beside the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: elevator shafts but these were evidently for emergency as they were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: closed with locked gratings.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The elevator stopped at my ring. Not sure of the proper manner of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: calling my floor I was carried past the medical level. As we shot up
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: through the three-hundred-metre shaft, the names of levels as I had read
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: them in my atlas flashed by on the blind doors. On the topmost defence
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: level we took on an officer of the roof guard--strangely swarthy of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: skin--and now the car shot down while the rising air rushed by us with a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: whistling roar.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: On the return trip I called my floor as I had heard others do and was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: let off at the medical level. It was even more monotonously quiet than
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the chemical level, save for the hurrying passage of occasional
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ambulances on their way between the elevators and the various hospitals.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The living quarters of the physicians were identical with those on the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemists' level. So, too, were the quiet shops from which the physicians
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: supplied their personal needs.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Standing before one of these I saw in a window a new book entitled
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Diseases of Nutrition." I went in and asked to see a copy. The book
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: seller staring at my chemical uniform in amazement reached quickly under
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the counter and pressed a button. I became alarmed and turned to go out
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: but found the door had been automatically closed and locked. Trying to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: appear unconcerned I stood idly glancing over the book shelves, while
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the book seller watched me from the corner of his eye.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: In a few minutes the door opened from without and a man in the uniform
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the street guard appeared. The book seller motioned toward me.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Your identification folder," said the guard.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Mechanically I withdrew it and handed it to him. He opened it and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: discovered the card from the hospital. Smiling on me with an air of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: condescension, he took me by the arm and led me forth and conducted me
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to my own apartment on the chemical level. Arriving there he pushed me
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: gently into a chair and stepped toward the switch of the telephone.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Just a minute," I said, "I remember now. I was not on my level--that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was not my book store."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The card orders me to call up the hospital," said the guard.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "It is unnecessary," I said. "Do not call them."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The guard gazed first at me and then at the card. "It is signed by a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Lieutenant and you are a Captain--" his brows knitted as he wrestled
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: with the problem--"I do not know what to do. Does a Captain with an
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: affected memory outrank a Lieutenant?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "He does," I solemnly assured him.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Still a little puzzled, he returned the card, saluted and was gone. It
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had been a narrow escape. I got out my atlas and read again the rules
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that set forth my right to be at large in the city. Clearly I had a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: right to be found in the medical level--but in trying to buy a book
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: there I had evidently erred most seriously. So I carefully memorized the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: list of shops set down in my identification folder and on my cards.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: For the next few days I lived alone in my apartment unmolested except by
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: an occasional visit from Holknecht, the laboratory assistant, who knew
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: nothing but chemistry, talked nothing but chemistry, and seemed dead to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: all human emotions and human curiosity. Applying myself diligently to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the study of Armstadt's books and notes, I was delighted to find that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the Germans, despite their great chemical progress, were ignorant of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: many things I knew. I saw that my knowledge discreetly used, might
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: enable me to become a great man among them and so learn secrets that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: would be of immense value to the outer world, should I later contrive to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: escape from Berlin.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: By my discoveries of the German workings in the potash mines I had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: indeed opened a new road to Berlin. It was up to me by further
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: discoveries to open a road out again, not only for my own escape, but
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: perhaps also to find a way by which the World Armies might enter Berlin
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: as the Greeks entered Troy. Vague ambitious dreams were these that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: filled and thrilled me, for I was young in years, and the romantic
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: spirit of heroic adventure surged in my blood.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: These days of study were quite uneventful, except for a single
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: illuminating incident; a further example of the super-efficiency of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Germans. I found the meals served me at my apartment rather less in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: quantity than my appetite craved. While there was a reasonable variety,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the nutritive value was always the same to a point of scientific
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: exactness, and I had seen no shops where extra food was available. After
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I had been in my apartment about a week, some one rang at the door. I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: opened it and a man called out the single word, "Weigher." Just behind
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: him stood a platform scale on small wheels and with handles like a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: go-cart. The weigher stood, notebook in hand, waiting for me to act. I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: took the hint and stepped upon the scales. He read the weight and as he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: recorded it, remarked:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Three kilograms over."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Without further explanation he pushed the scales toward the next door.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The following day I noticed that the portions of food served me were a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: trifle smaller than they had been previously. The original Karl Armstadt
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had evidently been of such build that he carried slightly less weight
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: than I, which fact now condemned me to this light diet.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: However, I reasoned that a light diet is conducive to good brain work,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and as I later learned, the object of this systematic weight control was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: not alone to save food but to increase mental efficiency, for a fat man
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: is phlegmatic and a lean one too excitable for the best mental output.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: It would also help my disguise by keeping me the exact weight and build
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the original Karl Armstadt.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: After a fortnight of study, I felt that I was now ready to take up my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: work in the laboratory, but I feared my lack of general knowledge of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: city and its ways might still betray me. Hence I began further
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: journeyings about the streets and shops of those levels where a man of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my class was permitted to go.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: After exhausting the rather barren sport of walking about the monotonous
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: streets of the four professional levels I took a more exciting trip down
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: into the lower levels of the city where the vast mechanical industries
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: held sway. I did not know how much freedom might be allowed me, but I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: reasoned that I would be out of my supposed normal environment and hence
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my ignorance would be more excusable and in less danger of betraying me.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Alighting from the elevator, I hurried along past endless rows of heavy
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: columns. I peered into the workrooms, which had no enclosing walls, and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: discovered with some misgiving that I seemed to have come upon a race of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: giants. The men at the machines were great hulking fellows with thick,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: heavy muscles such as one would expect to see in a professional wrestler
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: or weight-lifter. I paused and tried to gauge the size of these men: I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: decided that they were not giants for I had seen taller men in the outer
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: world. Two officials of some sort, distinguishable by finer garb,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: walking among them, appeared to be men of average size, and the tops of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: their heads came about to the workers' chins. That there should be such
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: men among the Germans was not unbelievable, but the strange thing was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that there should be so many of them, and that they should be so
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: uniformly large, for there was not a workman in the whole vast factory
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: floor that did not over-top the officials by at least half a head.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Of course," I reasoned, "this is part of German efficiency";--for the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: men were feeding large plates through stamping mills--"they have
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: selected all the large men for this heavy work." Then as I continued to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: gaze it occurred to me that this bright metal these Samsons were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: handling was aluminum!
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I went on and came to a different work hall where men were tending wire
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: winding machinery, making the coils for some light electrical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: instruments. It was work that girls could easily have done, yet these
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: men were nearly, if not quite, as hulking as their mates in the stamping
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: mill. To select such men for light-fingered work was not efficiency but
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: stupidity,--and then it came to me that I had also thought the soldiers
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I had seen in the hospital to be men picked for size, and that in a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: normal population there could not be such an abundance of men of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: abnormal size. The meaning of it all began to clear in my mind--the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: pedigree in my own identification folder with the numerous fraternity,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the system of social castes which my atlas had revealed, the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: inexplicable and unnatural proportion of the sexes. These gigantic men
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were not the mere pick from individual variation in the species, but a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: distinct breed within a race wherein the laws of nature, that had kept
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: men of equal stature for countless centuries, even as wild animals were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: equal, had been replaced by the laws of scientific breeding. These heavy
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and ponderous labourers were the Percherons and Clydesdales of a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: domesticated and scientifically bred human species. The soldiers,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: somewhat less bulky and more active, were, no doubt, another distinct
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: breed. The professional classes which had seemed quite normal in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: physical appearance--were they bred for mental rather than physical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: qualities? Otherwise why the pedigree, why the rigid castes, the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: isolation of women? I shuddered as the whole logical, inevitable
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: explanation unfolded. It was uncanny, unearthly, yet perfectly
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: scientific; a thing the world had speculated about for centuries, a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: thing that every school boy knew could be done, and yet which I, facing
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the fact that it had been done, could only believe by a strained effort
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: at scientific coolness.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I walked on and on, absorbed, overwhelmed by these assaulting,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: unbelievable conclusions, yet on either side as I walked was the ever
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: present evidence of the reality of these seemingly wild fancies. There
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were miles upon miles of these endless workrooms and everywhere the same
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: gross breed of great blond beasts.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The endless shops of Berlin's industrial level were very like those
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: elsewhere in the world, except that they were more vast, more
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: concentrated, and the work more speeded up by super-machines and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: excessive specialization. Millions upon millions of huge, drab-clad,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: stolid-faced workmen stood at their posts of duty, performing over and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: over again their routine movements as the material of their labors
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: shuttled by in endless streams.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Occasionally among the workmen I saw the uniforms of the petty officers
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: who acted as foremen, and still more rarely the administrative offices,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: where, enclosed in glass panelled rooms, higher officials in more
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: bespangled uniforms poured over charts and plans.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: In all this colossal business there was everywhere the atmosphere of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: perfect order, perfect system, perfect discipline. Go as I might among
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the electrical works, among the vast factories of chemicals and goods,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the lighter labor of the textile mills, or the heavier, noisier business
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the mineral works and machine shops the same system of colossal
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: coordinate mechanism of production throbbed ceaselessly. Materials
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: flowed in endless streams, feeding electric furnaces, mills, machines;
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: passing out to packing tables and thence to vast store rooms. Industry
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: here seemed endless and perfect. The bovine humanity fitted to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: machinery as the ox to the treadmill. Everywhere was the ceaseless
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: throbbing of the machine. Of the human variation and the free action of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: man in labour, there was no evidence, and no opportunity for its
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: existence.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Turning from the mere monotonous endlessness of the workshops I made my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: way to the levels above where the workers lived in those hours when they
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ceased to be a part of the industrial mechanism of production; and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: everywhere were drab-coloured men for these shifts of labour were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: arranged so that no space at any time was wholly idle. I now passed by
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: miles of sleeping dormitories, and other miles of gymnasiums, picture
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: theatres and gaming tables, and, strikingly incongruous with the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: atmosphere of the place, huge assembly rooms which were labelled "Free
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Speech Halls." I started to enter one of these, where some kind of a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: meeting was in progress, but I was thrust back by a great fellow who
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: grinned foolishly and said: "Pardon, Herr Captain, it is forbidden you."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Through half-darkened streets, I again passed by the bunk-shelved
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sleeping chambers with their cavernous aisles walled with orderly rows
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of lockers. Again I came to other barracks where the men were not yet
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: asleep but were straggling in and sitting about on the lowest bunks of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: these sterile makeshift homes.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I then came into a district of mess halls where a meal was being served.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Here again was absolute economy and perfect system. The men dined at
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: endless tables and their food like the material for their labours, was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: served to the workers by the highly efficient device of an endless
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: moving belt that rolled up out of a slot in the floor at the end of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: table after the manner of the chained steps of an escalator.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: From the moving belts the men took their portions, and, as they finished
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: eating, they cleared away by setting the empty dishes back upon the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: moving belt. The sight fascinated me, because of the adaptation of this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: mechanical principle to so strange a use, for the principle is old and,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: as every engineer knows, was instrumental in founding the house of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Detroit Vehicle Kings that once dominated the industrial world. The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: founder of that illustrious line gave the poorest citizen a motor car
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and disrupted the wage system of his day by paying his men double the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: standard wage, yet he failed to realize the full possibilities of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: efficiency for he permitted his men to eat at round tables and be served
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: by women! Truly we of the free world very narrowly escaped the fetish of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: efficiency which finally completely enslaved the Germans.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Each of the long tables of this Berlin dining hall, the ends of which
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: faced me, was fenced off from its neighbours. At the entrance gates were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: signs which read "2600 Calories," "2800 Calories," "3000 Calories"--I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: followed down the line to the sign which read "Maximum Diet, 4000
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Calories." The next one read, "Minimum Diet 2000 Calories," and thence
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the series was repeated. Farther on I saw that men were assembling
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: before such gates in lines, for the meal there had not begun. Moving to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the other side of the street I walked by the lines which curved out and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: swung down the street. Those before the sign of "Minimum Diet" were not
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: quite so tall as the average, although obviously of the same breed. But
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: they were all gaunt, many of them drooped and old, relatively the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: inferior specimens and their faces bore a cowering look of fear and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: shame, of men sullen and dull, beaten in life's battle. Following down
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the line and noting the improvement in physique as I passed on, I came
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to the farthest group just as they had begun to pass into the hall.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: These men, entering the gate labelled "Maximum Diet, 4000 Calories,"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were obviously the pick of the breed, middle-aged, powerful,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Herculean,--and yet not exactly Herculean either, for many of them were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: overfull of waistline, men better fed than is absolutely essential to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: physical fitness. Evidently a different principle was at work here than
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the strict economy of food that required the periodic weighing of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: professional classes.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Turning back I now encountered men coming out of the dining hall in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which I had first witnessed the meal in progress. I wanted to ask
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: questions and yet was a little afraid. But these big fellows were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: seemingly quite respectful; except when I started to enter the Free
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Speech Hall, they had humbly made way for me. Emboldened by their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: deference I now approached a man whom I had seen come out of a "3800
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Calories" gate, and who had crossed the street and stood there picking
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: his teeth with his finger nail.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: He ceased this operation as I approached and was about to step aside.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But I paused and smiled at him, much, I fear, as one smiles at a dog of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: unknown disposition, for I could hardly feel that this ungainly creature
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was exactly human. He smiled back and stood waiting.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Perhaps, I stammered," you will tell me about your system of eating; it
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: seems very interesting."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "I eat thirty-eight," he grinned, "pretty good, yes? I am twenty-five
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: years old and not so tall either."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I eyed him up--my eyes came just to the top button of his jacket.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "I began thirty," continued the workman, "I came up one almost every
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: year, one year I came up two at once. Pretty good, yes? One more
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to come."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "What then?" I asked.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The big fellow smiled with a childish pride, and doubling up his arm, as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: huge as an average man's thigh, he patted his biceps. "I get it all
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: right. I pass examination, no flaws in me, never been to hospital, not
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: one day. Yes, I get it."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Get what?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Paternity," said the man in a lower voice, as he glanced about to see
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: if any of his fellows was listening. "Paternity, you know? Women!"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I thought of many questions but feared to ask them. The worker waited
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for some men to pass, then he bent over me, grinning sardonically. "Did
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: you see them? You have seen women, yes?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Yes," I ventured, "I have seen women."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Pretty good, beautiful, yes?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Yes," I stammered, "they are very beautiful." But I was getting nervous
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and moved away. The workman, hesitating a little, then followed at
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my side.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But tell me," I said, "about these calories. What did you do to get the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: big meals? Why do some get more to eat than others?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Better man," he replied without hesitation.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But what makes a better man?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "You don't know; of course, you are an intellectual and don't work. But
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: we work hard. The harder we work the more we eat. I load aluminum pigs
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: on the elevator. One pig is two calories, nineteen hundred pigs a day,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: pretty good, yes? All kind of work has its calories, so many for each
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: thing to do.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "More work, more food it takes to do it. They say all is alike, that no
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: one can get fat. But all work calories are not alike because some men
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: get fatter than others. I don't get fat; my work is hard. I ought to get
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: two and a half calories for each pig I load. Still I do not get thin,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: but I do not play hard in gymnasium, see? Those lathe men, they got it
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: too easy and they play hard in gymnasium. I don't care if you do report.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I got it mad at them; they got it too easy. One got paternity last year
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: already, and he is not as good a man as I am. I could throw him over my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: shoulder in wrestling. Do you not think they get it too easy?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Do the men like this system," I asked; "the measuring of food by the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: amount of work one does? Do any of them talk about it and demand that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: all be fed alike?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The skinny minimum eaters do," said the workman with a sneer, "when we
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: let them talk, which isn't often, but when they get a chance they talk
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Bellamism. But what if they do talk, it does them no good. We have a red
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: flag, we have Imperial Socialism; we have the House of Hohenzollern.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Well, then, I say, let them talk if they want to, every man must eat
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: according to his work; that is socialism. We can't have Bellamism when
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: we have socialism."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: This speech, so much more informative and evidencing a knowledge I had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: not anticipated, quite disturbed me. "You talk about these things," I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ventured, "in your Free Speech Halls?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The hitherto pleasant face of the workingman altered to an ugly frown.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "No you don't," he growled, "you don't think because I talk to you, that
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: you can go asking me what is not your right to know, even if you are
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: an officer?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I remained discreetly silent, but continued to walk at the side of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: striding giant. Presently I asked:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "What do you do now, are you going to work?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "No," he said, looking at me doubtfully, "that was dinner, not
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: breakfast. I am going now to the picture hall."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "And then," I asked, "do you go to bed?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "No," he said, "we then go to the gymnasium or the gaming tables. Six
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hours' work, six hours' sleep, and four hours for amusement."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "And what do you do," I asked, "the remainder of the day?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: He turned and stared at me. "That is all we get here, sixteen hours.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: This is the metal workers' level. Some levels get twenty hours. It
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: depends on the work."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But," I said, "a real day has twenty-four hours."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "I've heard," he said, "that it does on the upper levels."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But," I protested, "I mean a real day--a day of the sun. Do you
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: understand that?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Oh yes," he said, "we see the pictures of the Place in the Sun. That's
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a fine show."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Oh," I said, "then you have pictures of the sun?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Of course," he replied, "the sun that shines upon the throne. We all
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: see that."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: At the time I could not comprehend this reference, but I made bold to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ask if it were forbidden me to go to his picture hall.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "I can't make out," he said, "why you want to see, but I never heard of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: any order forbidding it.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "I go here," he remarked, as we came to a picture theatre.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I let my Herculean companion enter alone, but followed him shortly and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found a seat in a secluded corner. No one disputed my presence.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The music that filled the hall from some hidden horn was loud and, in a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: rough way, joyous. The pictures--evidently carefully prepared for such
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: an audience--were limited to the life that these men knew. The themes
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were chiefly of athletic contests, of boxing, wrestling and feats of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: strength. There were also pictures of working contests, always ending by
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the awarding of honours by some much bespangled official. But of love
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and romance, of intrigue and adventure, of pathos and mirth, these
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: pictures were strangely devoid,--there was, in fact, no woman's likeness
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: cast upon the screen and no pictures depicting emotion or sentiment.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I watched the sterile flittings of the picture screen I decided,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: despite the glimmering of intelligence that my talking Hercules had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: shown in reference to socialism and Bellamism and the secrets of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Free Speech Halls, that these men were merely great stupid beasts
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of burden.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: They worked, they fed, they drank, they played exuberantly in their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: gymnasiums and swimming pools, they played long and eagerly at games of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chance. Beyond this their lives were essentially blank. Ambition and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: curiosity they had none beyond the narrow circle of their round of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: living. But for all that they were docile, contented and, within their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: limitations, not unhappy. To me they seemed more and more to be like
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: well cared for domestic animals, and I found myself wondering, as I left
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the hall, why we of the outer world had not thought to produce pictures
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: in similar vein to entertain our dogs and horses.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I returned to my own quarters, I tried to recall the description I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had read of the "Children of the Abyss," the dwellers in ancient city
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: slums. There was a certain kinship, no doubt, between those former
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: submerged workers in the democratic world and this labour breed of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Berlin. Yet the enslaved and sweated workers of the old regime were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: always depicted as suffering from poverty, as undersized, ill-nourished
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and afflicted with disease. The reformers of that day were always
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: talking of sanitary housing, scientific diet and physical efficiency.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But here was a race of labourers whose physical welfare was as well
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: taken care of as if they had been prize swine or oxen. There was a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: paleness of countenance among these labourers of Berlin that to me
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: seemed suggestive of ill health, but I knew that was merely due to lack
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of sun and did not signify a lack of physical vitality. Mere
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sun-darkened skin does not mean physiological efficiency, else the negro
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were the most efficient of races. Men can live without sun, without
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: rain, without contact with the soil, without nature's greenery and the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: brotherhood of fellow species in wild haunts. The whole climb of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: civilization had been away from these primitive things. It had merely
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: been an artificial perfecting of the process of giving the living
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: creature that which is needed for sustenance and propagation in the most
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: concentrated and most economical form, the elimination of Nature's
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: superfluities and wastes.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I thought of these things it came over me that this unholy
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: imprisonment of a race was but the logical culmination of mechanical and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: material civilization. This development among the Germans had been
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hastened by the necessities of war and siege, yet it was what the whole
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: world had been driving toward since man first used a tool and built a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hut. Our own freer civilization of the outer world had been achieved
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: only by compromises, by a stubborn resistance against the forces to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which we ascribed our progress. We were merely not so completely
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: civilized, because we had never been wholly domesticated.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I now record these thoughts on the true significance of the perfected
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: civilization of the Germans I realize that I was even more right than I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: then knew, for the sunless city of Berlin is of a truth a civilization
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: gone to seed, its people are a domesticated species, they are the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: logical outcome of science applied to human affairs, with them the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: prodigality and waste of Nature have been eliminated, they have stamped
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: out contagious diseases of every kind, they have substituted for the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: laws of Nature the laws that man may pick by scientific theory and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: experiment from the multitude of possibilities. Yes, the Germans were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: civilized. And as I pondered these things I recalled those fairy tales
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that naturalists tell of the stagnant and fixed society of ants in their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: subterranean catacombs. These insect species credited for industry and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: intelligence, have in their lesser world reached a similar perfection of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: civilization. Ants have a royal house, they have a highly specialized
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and fixed system of caste, a completely socialized state--yes, a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Utopia--even as Berlin was a Utopia, with the light of the sun and the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: light of the soul, the soul of the wild free man, forever shut out. Yes,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I was walking in Utopia, a nightmare at the end of man's long
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: dream--Utopia--Black Utopia--City of Endless Night--diabolically
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: compounded of the three elements of civilization in which the Germans
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had always been supreme--imperialism, science and socialism.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: CHAPTER IV
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I GO PLEASURING ON THE LEVEL OF FREE WOMEN AND DRINK SYNTHETIC BEER
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I had returned from my adventure on the labour levels in a mood of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo
