text: sombre depression. Alone again in my apartment I found difficulty in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: getting my mind back upon chemical books. With a sense of relief I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: reported to Holknecht that I thought myself sufficiently recovered to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: return to work.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: My laboratory I found to be almost as secluded as my living quarters. I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was master there, and as a research worker I reported to no man until I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had finished the problem assigned me. From my readings and from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Holknecht's endless talking I had fairly well grasped the problem on
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which I was supposed to be working, and I now had Holknecht go carefully
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: over the work he had done in my absence and we prepared a report. This I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sent to headquarters with a request for permission to start work on
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: another problem, the idea for which I claimed to have conceived on my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: visit to the attacked potash mines.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Permission to undertake the new problem was promptly granted. I now set
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to work to reproduce in a German laboratory the experiments by which I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had originally conquered the German gas that had successfully defended
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: those mines from the world for over a century. Though loath to make this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: revelation, I knew of no other "Discovery" wherewith to gain the stakes
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for which I was playing.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Events shaped themselves most rapidly along the lines of my best hopes.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The new research proved a blanket behind which to hide my ignorance. We
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: needed new material, new apparatus, and new data and I encouraged
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Holknecht to advise me as to where to obtain these things and so gained
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: requisite working knowledge.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The experiments and demonstrations finished, I made my report. My
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: immediate superior evidently quickly recognized it as a matter too
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: important for his consideration and dutifully passed it up to his own
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: superiors. In a few days I was notified to prepare for a demonstration
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: before a committee of the Imperial Chemical Staff.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: They came to my small laboratory with much eager curiosity. From their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: manner of making themselves known to me I realized with joy that they
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were dealing with a stranger. Indeed it was improbable that it should
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: have been otherwise for there were upwards of fifty thousand chemists of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my rank in Berlin.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The demonstration went off with a flourish and the committee were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: greatly impressed. Means were at once taken to alter the gas with which
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the Stassfurt mines were flooded, but I realized that meant nothing
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: since I believed that my companions had abandoned the enterprise and the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: secret that had enabled me to invade mines had not been shared with any
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: one in the outer world.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I anticipated, my revelation was accepted by the Chemical Staff as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: evidence of profound scientific genius. It followed as a logical matter
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that I should be promoted to the highest rank of research chemists with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the title of Colonel. Because of my youth the more was made of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: honour. This promotion entitled me to double my previous salary, to a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: larger laboratory and larger and better living quarters in a distant
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: part of the city.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: My assistant would now be of the rank I had previously been and as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Holknecht was not eligible to such promotion I was removed entirely from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: all previous acquaintances and surroundings and so greatly decreased the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chance of discovery of my true identity.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: After I had removed to my new quarters I was requested to call at the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: office of the Chemical Staff to discuss the line of research I should
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: next take up. My adviser in this matter was the venerable Herr von Uhl,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a white haired old patriarch whose jacket was a mass of decorations. The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: insignia on the left breast indicating the achievements in chemical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: science were already familiar to me, but those on the right breast
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were strange.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Perhaps I stared at them a little, for the old man, noting my interest,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: remarked proudly, "Yes, I have contributed much glory to the race and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: our group,--one hundred and forty-seven children,--one hundred and four
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of them sons, fifty-eight already of a captain's rank, and twenty-nine
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of them colonels--my children of the second and third generation number
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: above two thousand. Only three men living in Berlin have more total
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: descendants--and I am but seventy-eight years of age. If I live to be
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ninety I shall break all records of the Eugenic Office. It all comes of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: good breeding and good work. I won my paternity right, when I was but
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: twenty-eight, just about your age. If you pass the physical test,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: perhaps you can duplicate my record. For this early promotion you have
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: won qualifies you mentally."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Astonished and alarmed beyond measure I could find no reply and sat
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: staring dumbly, while Herr von Uhl, beginning to speak of chemical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: matters, inquired if I had any preference as to the problem I should now
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: take up. Incapable of any clear thinking I could only ask if he had any
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to suggest.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Immediately the old man's face brightened. "A man of your genius," he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: said, "should be permitted to try his brain with the greatest problems
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: on which the life of Germany depends. The Staff discussed this and has
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: assigned you to original research for the finding of a better method of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the extraction of protium from the ore. To work on this assignment you
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: must of necessity share grave secrets, which, should they be disclosed,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: might create profound fears, but your professional honour is a sufficient
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: guarantee of secrecy. In this research you will compete with some of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: most distinguished chemists in Berlin. If you should be successful you
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: will be decorated by His Majesty and you will receive a liberal pension
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: commensurate with the value of your discovery."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I was profoundly impressed. Evidently I had stumbled upon something of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: vital importance, the real nature of which I did not in the least
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: comprehend, and happily was not supposed to. The interview was ended by
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my being entrusted with voluminous unpublished documents which I was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: told to take home and study. Two armed men were ordered to accompany me
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and to stand alternate guard outside my apartment while I had the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: documents in my possession.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: In the quiet of my new abode I unsealed the package. The first sheet
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: contained the official offer of the rewards in store for success with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the research. The further papers explained the occasion for the gravity
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and secrecy, and outlined the problem.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The colossal consequence of the matter with which I was dealing gripped
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and thrilled me. Protium, it seemed, was the German name for a rare
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: element of the radium group, which, from its atomic weight and other
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: properties, I recognized as being known to the outside world only as a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: laboratory curiosity of no industrial significance.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But, as used by the Germans, this element was the essence of life
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: itself, for by the influence of its emanations, they had achieved the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: synthesis of protein capable of completely nourishing the human body--a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: thing that could be accomplished in the outside world only through the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: aid of natural protein derived from plants and animals.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: How I wished, as I read, that my uncle could have shared with me this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: revelation of a secret that he had spent his life in a fruitless effort
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to unravel. We had long since discovered how the Germans had synthesized
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the carbohydrate molecule from carbon dioxide and water and built
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: therefrom the sugars, starches and fat needed for human nutrition. We
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: knew quite as well how they had created the simpler nitrogen compounds,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that this last step of synthesizing complete food proteins--a step
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: absolutely essential to the support of human life wholly from synthetic
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: foods--the chemists of the outer world had never mastered.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But no less interesting than the mere chemistry of all this was the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: history of it all, and the light it threw on the larger story of how
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Germany had survived when the scientists of the world had predicted her
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: speedy annihiliation. The original use of protium had, I found, been
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: discovered late in the Twentieth Century when the protium ores of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Ural Mountains were still available to the German chemists. After Russia
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had been won by the World Armies, the Germans for a time suffered
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chronic nitrogen starvation, as they depended on the protium derived
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: from what remained of their agriculture and from the fisheries in the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Baltic. As the increasing bombardment from the air herded them within
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: their fast building armoured city, and drove them beneath the soil in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: all other German territory and from the surface of the sea in the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Baltic; they must have perished miserably but for the discovery of a new
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: source of protium.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: This source they had found in the uninhabited islands of the Arctic,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: where the formation of the Ural Mountains extends beneath the sea.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Sending their submarines thence in search of platinum ores they had not
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found platinum but a limited supply of ore containing the even more
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: valuable protium. By this traffic Germany had survived for a century and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a half. The quantity of the rare element needed was small, for its
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: effect, like that of radium, was out of all proportion to its bulk. But
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: this little they must have, and it seems that the supply of ore
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was failing.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Nor was that all to interest me. How did the German submarine get to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Arctic since the World State had succeeded, after half a century of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: effort, in damming the Baltic by closing up several passes among the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Danish Islands and the main pass of the sound between Zealand and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Sweden? I remember, as a youngster, the great Jubilee that celebrated
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the completion of that monumental task, and the joy that hailed from the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: announcement that the world's shipping would at last be freed from an
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ancient scourge.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But little had we of the world known the magnitude of the German fears
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: as the Baltic dam neared completion. We had thought merely to protect
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: our commerce from German piracy and perhaps to stop them from getting a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: little copper and rubber in some remote corner of the earth. But we did
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: not realize that we were about to cut them off from an essential element
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: without which that conceited and defiant race must have speedily run up
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the white flag of absolute surrender or have died to the last man, like
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: rats in a neglected trap.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But the completion of the Baltic dam evidently had not shut off the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: supply of Arctic ore, for the annual importation of ore was given right
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: up to date though the Baltic had been closed for nearly a score of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: years. Eagerly I searched my papers for an item that would give some
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hint as to how the submarines got out of the dammed-up Baltic. But on
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that point the documents before me were silent. They referred to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Arctic ore, gave elaborate details as to mineralogy and geology of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: strata from which it came, but as to the ways of its coming into Berlin
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: there was not the slightest suggestion. That this ore must come by
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: submarine was obvious. If so, the submarine must be at large in the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Atlantic and Arctic seas, and those occasional reports of periscopes
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sighted off the coast of Norway, which have never been credited, were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: really true. The submarines, or at least their cargoes, must reach
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Berlin by some secret passage. Here indeed was a master mystery, a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: secret which, could I unravel it and escape to the outer world with the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: knowledge, would put unconditionally within the power of the World State
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the very life of the three hundred millions of this unholy race that was
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: bred and fed by science in the armoured City of Berlin, or that, working
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: like blind moles of the earth, held the world at bay from off the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sterile and pock-marked soil of all that was left of the one-time
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German Empire.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: That night I did not sleep till near the waking hour, and when the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: breakfast container bumped into the receiving cupboard I was nodding
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: over the chemical papers amid strange and wonderful dreams.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Next day with three assistants, themselves chemists of no mean rank, I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: set to work to prepare apparatus for repeating all the known processes
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: in the extraction and use of the rare and vital element. This work
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: absorbed me for many weeks, during which time I went nowhere and saw no
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: one and slept scarce one hour out of four.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But the steady application told upon me, and, by way of recreation, I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: decided to spend an evening on the Level of Free Women, a place to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which, much though it fascinated me, I had not yet mustered the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: courage to go.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: My impression, as I stepped from the elevator, was much as that of a man
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: who alights from a train in a strange city on a carnival night. Before
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: me, instead of the narrow, quiet streets of the working and living
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: quarters of the city, there spread a broad and seemingly endless hall of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: revelry, broken only by the massive grey pillars that held up the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: multi-floored city. The place was thronged with men of varied ranks and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: professions. But more numerous and conspicuous were the women, the first
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and only women that I had seen among the Germans--the Free Women of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Berlin, dressed in gorgeous and daring costumes; women of whom but few
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: were beautiful, yet in whose tinted cheeks and sparkling eyes was all
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the lure of parasitic love.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The multi-hued apparel of the throng dazzled and astonished me.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Elsewhere I had found a sterile monotony of dress and even of stature
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and features. But here was resplendent variety and display. Men from all
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the professional and military classes mingled indiscriminately, their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: divers uniforms and decorations suggesting a dress ball in the capital
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the world. But the motley costumes of the women, who dressed with the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: license of unrestrained individuality, were even more startling and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: bizarre--a kaleidoscopic fantastic masquerade.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I wondered if the rule of convention and tyranny of style had lost all
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hold upon these women. And yet I decided, as I watched more closely,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that there was not an absence of style but rather a warfare of styles.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The costumes varied from the veiled and beruffled displays, that left
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: one confounded as to what manner of creature dwelt therein, to the other
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: extreme of mere gaudily ornamented nudity. I smiled as I recalled the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: world-old argument on the relative modesty of much or little clothing,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for here immodesty was competing side by side in both extremes, both
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: seemingly equally successful.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But it was not alone in the matter of dress that the women of the Free
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Level varied. They differed even more strikingly in form and feature,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for, as I was later more fully to comprehend, these women were drawn
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: from all the artificially specialized breeds into which German science
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had wrought the human species. Most striking and most numerous were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: those whom I rightly guessed to be of the labour strain. Proportionally
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: not quite so large as the males of the breed, yet they were huge,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: full-formed, fleshly creatures, with milky white skin for the most part
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: crudely painted with splashes of vermilion and with blued or blackened
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: brows. The garishness of their dress and ornament clearly bespoke the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: poorer quality of their intellect, yet to my disgust they seemed fully
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: as popular with the men as the smaller and more refined types, evidently
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: from the intellectual strains of the race.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Happily these ungainly women of the labour strain were inclined to herd
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: by themselves and I hastened to direct my steps to avoid as much as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: possible their overwhelming presence.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The smaller women, who seemed to be more nearly human, were even more
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: variegated in their features and make-up. They were not all blondes,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for some of them were distinctively dark of hair and skin, though
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I was puzzled to tell how much of this was inborn and how much
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the work of art. Another thing that astonished me was the wide
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: range of bodily form, as evidently determined by nutrition. Clearly
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: there was no weight-control here, for the figures varied from extreme
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: slenderness to waddling fatness. The most common type was that of mild
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: obesity which men call "plumpness," a quality so prized since the world
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: began that the women of all races by natural selection become relatively
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: fatter than men.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: For the most part I found these women unattractive and even repellent,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and yet as I walked about the level I occasionally caught fleeting
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: glimpses of genuine beauty of face and form, and more rarely expressions
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of a seeming high order of intelligence.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: This revelling multitude of men and girls was uproariously engaged in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the obvious business of enjoying themselves by means of every art known
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to appeal to the mind of man--when intelligence is abandoned and moral
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: restraint thrown to the winds.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I wended my way among the multitude, gay with colour, noisy with chatter
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and mingled music, redolent with a hundred varieties of sensuous
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: perfume. I came upon a dancing floor. Whirling and twisting about the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: columns, circling around a gorgeous scented and iridescent fountain,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: officers and scientists, chemists and physicians, each clasping in his
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: arms a laughing girl, danced with abandon to languorous music.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As I watched the dance I overheard two girls commenting upon the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: appearance of the dancers. Whirling by in the arms of a be-medalled
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: officer, was a girl whose frizzled yellow hair fell about a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: dun-brown face.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Did you see that, Fedora, tanned as a roof guard and with that hair!"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Well, you know," said the other, "it's becoming quite the fashion
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: again."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Why don't you try it? Three baths would tan you adorably and you do
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: have the proper hair."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Oh, yes, I have the hair, all right, but my skin won't stand it. I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: tried it three years ago and I blistered outrageously."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The talk drifted to less informing topics and I moved on and came to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: other groups lounging at their ease on rugs and divans as they watched
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: more skilful girls squirming through some intricate ballet on an
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: exhibition platform.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Seeing me stand apart, a milk-white girl with hair dyed pink came
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: tugging at my arm. Her opalescent eyes looked from out her chalky
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: countenance; but they were not hard eyes, indeed they seemed the eyes of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: innocence. As I shook my head and rebuffed her cordial advance I felt,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: not that I was refusing the proffered love of a painted woman, but
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: rather that I was meanly declining a child's invitation to join her
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: play. In haste I edged away and wandered on past endless gaming tables
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: where men in feverish eagerness whirled wheels of chance, while garishly
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: dressed girls leaned on their shoulders and hung about their necks.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Announced by shouts and shrieking laughter I came upon a noisy jumble of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: mechanical amusement devices where men and girls in whirling upholstered
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: boxes were being pitched and tumbled about.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Beyond the noise of the childish whirligigs I came into a space where
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the white ceiling lights were dimmed by crimson globes and picture
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: screens were in operation. It did not take long for me to grasp the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: essential difference between these pictured stories and those I had seen
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: in the workmen's level. There love of woman was entirely absent from the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: screen. Here it was the sole substance of the pictures. But unlike the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: love romances of the outer world, there were no engagement rings, no
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: wedding bells, and never once did the face or form of a child appear.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: In seating myself to see the pictures I had carefully chosen a place
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: where there was only room for myself between a man and one of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: supporting columns. At an interlude the man arose to go. The girl who
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: had been with him arose also, but he pushed her back upon the bench,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: saying that he had other engagements, and did not wish her company. The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: moment he was gone the girl moved over and proceeded to crowd
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: caressingly against my shoulder. She was a huge girl, obviously of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: labour strain. She leaned over me as if I had been a lonely child and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: she a lonelier woman. Crowded against the pillar I could not escape and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: so tried to appear unconcerned.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Did you like that story?" I asked, referring to the picture that had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: just ended.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "No," she replied, "the girl was too timid. She could never have won a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: roof guard captain in that fashion. They are very difficult men, those
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: roof guard officers."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "And what kind of pictures do you prefer?" I asked.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Quartettes," she answered promptly. "Two men and two girls when both
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: girls want the other man, and both men want the girl they have. That
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: makes a jolly plot. Or else the ones where there are two perfect lovers
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and the man is elected to paternity and leaves her. I had a man like
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that once and it makes me sad to see such a picture."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Perhaps," I said, speaking in a timorous voice, "you wanted to go with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: him and be the mother of his children?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: She turned her face toward me in the dim light. "He talked like that,"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: she said, "and then, I hated him. I knew then that he wanted to go and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: leave me. That he hadn't tried to avoid the paternity draft. Yes, he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: wanted to sire children. And he knew that he would have to leave me. And
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: so I hated him for ever loving me."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: A strange thrill crept over me at the girl's words. I tried to fathom
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: her nature, to separate the tangle of reality from the artificial ideas
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ingrained by deliberate mis-education. "Did you ever see children? Here,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I mean. Pictures of them, perhaps, on the screen?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Never," said the girl, drawing away from me and straightening up till
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: my head scarce reached her shoulder. "And I never want to. I hate the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: thought of them. I wish I never had been one. Why can't
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: we--forget them?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I did not answer, and the labour girl, who, for some technical flaw in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: her physique had been rejected for motherhood, arose and walked
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ponderously away.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: After this baffling revelation of the struggle of human souls caught in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the maw of machine-made science, I found the picture screen a dull dead
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: thing, and I left the hall and wandered for miles, it seemed, past
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: endless confusion of meaningless revelry. Everywhere was music and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: gaming and laughter. Men and girls lounged and danced, or spun the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: wheels of fortune or sat at tables drinking from massive steins, a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: highly flavoured variety of rather ineffectual synthetic beer. Older
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: women served and waited on the men and girls, and for every man was at
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: least one girl and sometimes as many as could crowd about him. And so
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: they sang, and banged their mugs and sloshed their frothy beverage.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: A lonely stranger amidst the jostling throngs, I wandered on through the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: carnival of Berlin's Level of Free Women. Despite my longing for human
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: companionship I found it difficult to join in this strange recrudescent
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: paganism with any ease or grace.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Girls, alone or in groups, fluttered about me with many a covert or open
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: invitation to join in their merry-making, but something in my halting
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: manner and constrained speech seemed to repulse them, for they would
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: soon turn away as if condemning me as a man without appreciation of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: value of human enjoyment.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: My constraint and embarrassment were increased by a certain sense of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: guilt, a feeling which no one in this vast throng, either man or woman,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: seemed to share. The place had its own standard of ethics, and they were
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: shocking enough to a man nurtured in a human society founded on the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sanctification of monogamous marriage. But merely to condemn this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: recreational life of Germany, by likening it to the licentious freedom
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that exists in occasional unrestrained amusement places in the outer
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: world, would be to give a very incorrect interpretation of Berlin's
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Level of Free Women. As we know such places elsewhere in the world there
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: is always about them some tacit confession of moral delinquency, some
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: pretence of apology on the part of the participants. The women who so
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: revel in the outer world consider themselves under a ban of social
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: disapproval, while the men are either of a type who have no sense of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: moral restraint or men who have for the time abandoned it.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But for this life in Berlin no guilt was felt, no apology offered. The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: men considered it as quite a normal and proper part of their life, while
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the women looked upon it as their whole life, to which they had been
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: trained and educated and set apart by the Government; they accepted the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: role quite as did the scientist, labourer, soldier, or professional
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: mother. The state had decreed it to be. They did not question its
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: morality. Hence the life here was licentious and yet unashamed, much, as
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I fancy was the life in the groves of Athens or the baths of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: ancient Rome.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: CHAPTER V
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: I AM DRAFTED FOR PATERNITY AND MAKE EXTRAORDINARY
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: PETITION TO THE CHIEF OF THE EUGENIC STAFF
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: My research was progressing nicely and I had discovered that in this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: field of chemistry also my knowledge of the outer world would give me
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: tremendous advantages over all competitors. Eagerly I worked at the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: laboratory, spending most of my evenings in study. Occasionally I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: attended the educational pictures or dined on the Level of Free Women
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: with my chemical associates and spent an hour or so at dancing or at
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: cards. My life had settled into routine unbroken by adventure. Then I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: received a notice to report for the annual examination at the Physical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Efficiency Laboratory. I went with some misgivings, but the ordeal
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: proved uneventful. A week later I received a most disturbing
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: communication, a bulky and official looking packet bearing the imprint
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the Eugenic Office. I nervously slit the envelope and drew forth
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: a letter:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "You are hereby notified that you have reached a stage of advancement in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: your professional work that marks you a man of superior gifts, and,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: having been reported as physically perfect you are hereby honoured with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the high privilege and sacred duties of election to paternity. Full
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: instructions for your conduct in this duty to the State will be found in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the enclosed folder."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: In nervous haste I scanned the printed folder:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Your first duty will be to visit the boys' school for which passport is
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: here enclosed. The purpose of this is to awaken the paternal instincts
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that you may better appreciate and feel the holy obligation and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: privilege conferred upon you. You will also find enclosed cards of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: introduction to three women whom the Eugenic Office finds to be fitted
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: as mothers of your children. That natural selection may have a limited
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: play you are permitted to select only one woman from each three
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: assigned. Such selection must be made and reported within thirty days,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: after which a second trio will be assigned you. Until such final
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: selection has been recorded you are expressly forbidden to conduct
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: yourself toward these women in an amorous manner."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Next followed a set of exacting rules for the proper deportment, in the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: carrying out of these duties to which the State had assigned me.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: A crushing sense of revulsion, a feeling of loathing and uncleanliness
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: overwhelmed me as I pushed aside the papers. Coming from a world where
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the right of the individual to freedom and privacy in the matrimonial
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and paternal relations was recognized as a fundamental right of man, I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: found this officious communication, with its detailed instruction,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: appalling and revolting.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: A man cravenly clings to life and yet there are instincts in his soul
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which will cause him to sell life defiantly for a mere conception of a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: moral principle. To become by official mandate a father of a numerous
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German progeny was a thing to which I could not and would not submit.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Many times that day as I automatically pursued my work, I resolved to go
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to some one in authority and give myself up to be sent to the mines as a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: prisoner of war, or more likely to be executed as a spy. Cold reason
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: showed me the futility of neglecting or attempting to avoid an assigned
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: duty. It was a military civilization and I had already seen enough of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: this ordered life of Berlin to know that there was no middle ground of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: choice between explicit obedience and open rebellion. Nor need I concern
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: myself with what punishment might be provided for this particular
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: disobedience for I saw that rebellion for me would mean an investigation
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that would result in complete tearing away of the protecting mask of my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German identity.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: But after my first tumultuous feeling subsided I realized that something
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: more than my own life was at stake. Already possessed of much intimate
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: knowledge of the life within Berlin I believed that I was in a way to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: come into possession of secrets of vast and vital importance to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: world. To gain these secrets, to escape from the walls of Berlin, was a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: more than personal ambition; it was an ambition for mankind.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: After a day or two of deliberation I therefore decided against any rash
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: rebellion. Moreover, as nothing compromising was immediately required of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: me, I detached and mailed the four coupons provided, having duly filled
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: in the time at which I should make the preliminary calls.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: On the day and hour appointed I presented the school card to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: elevator operator, who punched it after the manner of his kind, and duly
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: deposited me on the level of schools for boys of the professional
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: groups. A lad of about sixteen met me at the elevator and conducted me
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to the school designated.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The master greeted me with obsequious gravity, and waved me to the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: visitor's seat on a raised platform. "You will be asked to speak," he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: said, "and I beg that you will tell the boys of the wonderful chemical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: discoveries that won you the honours of election to paternity."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But," I protested, as I glanced at the boys who were being put through
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: their morning drill in the gymnasium, "I fear the boys of such age will
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: not comprehend the nature of my work."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Certainly not," he replied, "and I would rather you did not try to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: simplify it for their undeveloped minds, merely speak learnedly of your
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: work as if you were addressing a body of your colleagues. The less the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: boys understand of it the more they will be impressed with its
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: importance, and the more ambitious they will be to become great
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemists."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: This strange philosophy of education annoyed me, but I did not have time
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to argue further for the bell had rung and the boys were filing in with
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: strict military precision. There were about fifty of them, all in their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: twelfth year, and of remarkable uniformity in size and development. The
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: blanched skin, which marked the adult faces of Berlin, was, in the pasty
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: countenance of those German boys, a more horrifying spectacle. Yet they
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: stood erect and, despite their lack of colour, were evidently a well
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: nourished, well exercised group of youngsters.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As the last boy reached his place the master motioned with his hand and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: fifty arms moved in unison in a mechanical salute.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "We have with us this morning," said the master, "a chemist who has won
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the honours of paternity with his original thought. He will tell you
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: about his work which you cannot understand--you should therefore listen
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: attentively."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: After a few more sentences of these paradoxical axioms on education, the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: master nodded, and, as I had been instructed, I proceeded to talk of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemical lore of poison gases.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "And now," said the master, when I resumed my seat, "we will have a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: review lesson. You will first recite in unison the creed of your caste."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "We are youth of the super-race," began the boys in a sing-song and well
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: timed chorus. "We belong to the chemical group of the intellectual
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: levels, being born of sires who were great chemists, born of great
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: chemists for many generations. It is our duty to learn while we are yet
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: young all that we may ever need to know, to keep our minds free from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: forbidden knowledge and to resist the temptation to think on unnecessary
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: things. So we may be good Germans, loyal to the House of Hohenzollern
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and to the worship of the old German God and the divine blood of William
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the Great."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The schoolmaster, who had nodded his head in unison with the rhythm of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the recitation, now smiled in satisfaction. "That was very good," he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: said. "I did not hear one faltering voice. Now you may recite
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: individually in your alphabetical order.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Anton, you may describe the stages in the evolution of the super-man."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Anton, a flaxen-haired youngster, arose, saluted like a wooden soldier,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and intoned the following monologue:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Man is an animal in the process of evolving into a god. The method of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: this evolution is a struggle in which the weak perish and the strong
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: survive. First in this process of man's evolution came the savage, who
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: lived with the lions and the apes. In the second stage came the dark
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: races who built the so-called ancient civilizations, and fought among
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: themselves to possess private property and women and children. Third
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: came the barbarian Blond Brutes, who were destined to sire the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: super-race, but the day had not yet come, and they mixed with the dark
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: races and produced the mongrel peoples, which make the fourth. The fifth
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: stage is the pure bred Blond Brutes, uncontaminated by inferior races,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which are the men, who under God's direction, built the Armoured City of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Berlin in which to breed the Supermen who are to conquer the mongrel
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: peoples. The sixth, last and culminating stage of the evolution of man
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: is the Divinity in human form which is our noble House of Hohenzollern,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: descended physically from William the Great, and spiritually from the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: soul of God Himself, whose statue stands with that of the Mighty William
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: at the portals of the Emperor's palace."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: It had been a noble effort for so young a memory and as the proud master
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: looked at me expectantly I could do nothing less than nod my
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: appreciation.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The master now gave Bruno the following cue:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Name the four kinds of government and explain each."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: From the sad-eyed youth of twelve came this flow of wisdom:
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The first form of government is monarchy, in which the people are ruled
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: by a man who calls himself a king but who has no divine authority so
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that the people sometimes failed to respect him and made revolutions and
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: tried to govern themselves. The second form of government is a republic,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: sometimes called a democracy. It is usually co-existent with the lawyer,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the priest, the family and the greed for gold. But in reality this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: government is by the rich men, who let the poor men vote and think they
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: have a share in the government, thus to keep them contented with their
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: poverty. The third form of government is proletariat socialism in which
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the people, having abolished kings and rich men, attempt to govern
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: themselves; but this they cannot do for the same reason that a man
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: cannot lift himself by his shoestraps--"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: At this point Bruno faltered and his face went chalky white. The teacher
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: being directly in front of the standing pupil did not see what had
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: happened, while I, with fleeting memory of my own school days,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: suppressed my mirth behind a formal countenance, as the stoic Bruno
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: resumed his seat.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The master marked zero on the roll and called upon Conrad, next in line,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: to finish the recitation.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The fourth and last form of government," recited Conrad, "is autocratic
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: socialism, the perfect government that we Germans have evolved from
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: proletariat socialism which had destroyed the greed for private property
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and private family life, so that the people ceased to struggle
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: individually and were ready to accept the Royal House, divinely
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: appointed by God to govern them perfectly and prepare them to make war
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for the conquest of the world."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The recitations now turned to repetitions of the pedigree and ranking of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the various branches of the Royal House. But it was a mere list of names
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: like the begats of Genesis and I was not able to profit much by this
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: opportunity to improve my own neglected education. As the morning wore
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: on the parrot-like monologues shifted to elementary chemistry.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The master had gone entirely through the alphabet of names and now
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: called again the apt Anton for a more brilliant demonstration of his
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: system of teaching. "Since we have with us a chemist who has achieved
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: powers of original thought, I will permit you, Anton, to demonstrate
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: that even at the tender age of twelve you are capable of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: original thought."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Anton rose gravely and stood at attention. "And what shall I think
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: about?" he asked.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "About anything you like," responded the liberal minded schoolmaster,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "provided it is limited to your permitted field of psychic activity."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Anton tilted back his head and gazed raptly at a portrait of the Mighty
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: William. "I think," he said, "that the water molecule is made of two
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: atoms of hydrogen and one of oxygen."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: A number of the boys shook their heads in disapproval, evidently
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: recognizing the thought as not being original, but the teacher waited in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: respectful silence for the founts of originality to burst forth in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Anton's mind.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "And I think," continued Anton, "that if the water molecule were made of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: four atoms of nitrogen and one of oxygen, it would be a great economy,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: for after we had bathed in the water we could evaporate it and make air
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and breath it, and after we had breathed it we could condense it again
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and use it to drink--"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "But that would be unsanitary," piped a voice from the back of the room.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: To this interruption Anton, without taking his gaze from the face of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: William, replied, "Of course it would if we didn't sterilize it, but I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was coming to that. We would sterilize it each time."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: The master now designated two boys to take to the guardhouse of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: school the lad who had spoken without permission. He then produced a red
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: cardboard cross adorned with the imperial eagle and crossed test-tubes
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the chemists' insignia and I was honoured by being asked to decorate
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: Anton for his brilliant exploit in original thought.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Our intellectual work of the day is over," resumed the master, "but in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: honour of our guest we will have, a day in advance, our weekly exercises
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: in emotion. Heinrich, you may recite for us the category of emotions."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The permitted emotions," said Heinrich, "are: First, anger, which we
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: should feel when a weak enemy offends us. Second, hate, which is a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: higher form of anger, which we should feel when a powerful enemy offends
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: us. Third, sadness, which we should feel when we suffer. Fourth, mirth,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which we should feel when our enemy suffers. Fifth, courage, which we
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: feel at all times because we believe in our strength. Sixth, humility,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: which we should feel only before our superiors. Seventh, and greatest,
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: is pride, which we should feel at all times because we are Germans.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "The forbidden emotions are very numerous. The chief ones which we must
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: guard against are: First, pity, which is a sadness when our enemy
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: suffers; to feel this is exceedingly wicked. Second, envy, which is a
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: feeling that some one else is better than we are, which we must not feel
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: at all because it is destructive of pride. Third, fear, which is a lack
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of courage. Fourth, love, which is a confession of weakness, and is
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: permissible only to women and dogs."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Very good," said the master, "I will now grant you permission to feel
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: some of the permitted emotions. We will first conduct a chemical
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: experiment. I have in this bottle a dangerous explosive and as I
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: drop in this pellet it may explode and kill us all, but you must
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: show courage and not fear." He held the pellet above the mouth of
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the bottle, but his eyes were on his pupils. As he dropped the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: pellet into the bottle, he knocked over with his foot a slab
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of concrete, which fell to the floor with a resounding crash. A
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: few of the boys jumped in their seats, and the master gravely marked
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: them as deficient in courage.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "You now imagine that you are adult chemists and that the enemy has
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: produced a new form of gas bomb, a gas against which we have no
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: protection. They are dropping the gas bombs into our ventilating shafts
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: and are killing our soldiers in the mines. You hate the enemy--hate
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: hard--make your faces black with hate and rage. Adolph, you are
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: expressing mere anger. There, that is better. You never can be a good
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: German until you learn to hate.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "And now we will have a permitted emotion that you all enjoy; the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: privilege to feel mirth is a thing for which you should be grateful.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "An enemy came flying over Berlin--and this is a true story. I can
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: remember when it happened. The roof guard shot at him and winged his
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: plane, and he came down in his parachute, which missed the roof of the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: city and fell to the earth outside the walls but within the first ring
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of the ray defences. He knew that he could not pass beyond this and he
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: wandered about for many days within range of the glasses of the roof
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: guards. When he was nearly starved he came near the wall and waved his
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: white kerchief, which meant he wished to surrender and be taken into
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the city."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: At this point one of the boys tittered, and the master stopped his story
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: long enough to mark a credit for this first laugh.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "As the enemy aviator continued to walk about waving his cowardly flag
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: another enemy plane saw him and let down a line, but the roof guards
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: shelled and destroyed the plane. Then other planes came and attempted to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: pick up the man with lines. In all seven planes were destroyed in
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: attempting to rescue one man. It was very foolish and very comical. At
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: last the eighth plane came and succeeded in reaching the man a line
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: without being winged. The roof batteries shot at the plane in vain--then
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the roof gunners became filled with good German hate, and one of them
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: aimed, not at the plane, but at the man swinging on the unstable wire
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: line two thousand metres beneath. The shell exploded so near that the
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: man disappeared as by magic, and the plane flew off with the empty
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: dangling line."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: As the story was finished the boys who had listened with varying degrees
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: of mechanical smiles now broke out into a chorus of raucous laughter. It
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: was a forced unnatural laughter such as one hears from a bad actor
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: attempting to express mirth he does not feel.
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: When the boys had ceased their crude guffaws the master asked, "Why did
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: you laugh?"
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "Because," answered Conrad, "the enemy were so stupid as to waste seven
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: planes trying to save one man."
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: "That is fine," said the master; "we should always laugh when our enemy
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: is stupid, because then he suffers without knowing why he suffers. If
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: the enemy were not stupid they would cease fighting and permit us to
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo

text: rule them and breed the stupidity out of them, as it has been bred out
title: City of Endless Night
author: Hastings, Milo
